ValidationRule.description: The Cancel Quote action is not used for QTC Quotes.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $Profile.Name <> "Data Loader Profile", $Profile.Name <> "Integration API Only Profile", TEXT( NokiaCPQ_Portfolio__c ) = 'QTC', OR(TEXT( PRIORVALUE( Apttus_Proposal__Approval_Stage__c ) ) = 'Approved',TEXT( PRIORVALUE( Apttus_Proposal__Approval_Stage__c ) ) = 'Accepted'), NokiaCPQ_Capture_Cancel_Recall_Action__c = 'Cancel Action', TEXT(Apttus_Proposal__Approval_Stage__c ) = 'Draft' )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The Cancel Quote action is not used for QTC Quotes.
